website_summaries.verdict: Between a house so filthy you can smell it, and slimy horrors lurking around every corner, you’ll be thrilled to try and flee the horrid Baker residence.
pros: Escape a house plagued by shark-toothed “Molded” monsters
Details so real your skin will crawl
cons: Some may not appreciate the first-person perspective

customer_reviews.title: Shocking scary/funny addictive game!
customer_reviews.text: Wow loved, loved this game. It makes you jump or laugh at the psycho-ness of it. The characters are all trailer trash weirdos which makes it scare and quite entertaining. Especially when they show up at unexpected places. It is another addictive Resident Evil game. Highly recommend for those who love games where you have to explore and search and evade characters. I dont like the war games so much. But this is in my wheelhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Tansyn

customer_reviews.title: Knocked it out of the park, and jump-started the Entire RE series
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games of the xboxone/ps4 generation, and a top entry in the current renaissance of horror games. For the record, it was the first RE game I ever played, and this didn’t detract in the slightest from the experience. Resident Evil 2 remastered is another must play, and judging by the demo, RE3 remastered is shaping up to be even better than its predecessor. Honestly one of the best video game series ever. There’s deeply detailed artistry, an engaging story, and it’s just...really fun. Must buy for any console owner.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Hayley Owen

customer_reviews.title: Interesting direction
customer_reviews.text: It was a different direction for the series, not sure if it paid off but it was a worthy experiment. The game is really slow to get going and I almost quit the game altogether at a few points early on. It proved to be a worthwhile experience although one would not have know that this was a Resident Evil game without looking at the title.
customer_reviews.author: Ding Dansen

customer_reviews.title: Brings resident evil back to it's horror roots while also ...
customer_reviews.text: Brings resident evil back to it's horror roots while also innovating and borrowing from other genres. The survival horde mode DLC seems a bit unfinished for how many hours you'd have to put in to get all of the items, but the rest of the DLC is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Brigandier

customer_reviews.title: I mean, did you expect it to be bad?
customer_reviews.text: Yup. It's good. Fun & sometimes (often) creepy gameplay. Great graphics, good scares. Multiple possible endings depending on your choices in game, so it has great replay value. A+
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel like RE. But it's a great horror story in it's own.
customer_reviews.author: IG Twistedexposure

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this game a lot. Very intense and twisted. The garage scene is insane. Definitely only for mature audiences. The DLC is also a lot of fun. Recommend this title! Go ahead and grab this game you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Love

customer_reviews.title: Back to the roots.
customer_reviews.text: Brings back the old school tension and terror of the classics, albeit in first person but in this case it was a great decision.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wittenmyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice turn around of the franchise
customer_reviews.text: Incredible game. Back to scary stuff... instead of previous instalation with global colorfull zombies. Nice turn around of the franchise. Now trying the addons wich are a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ultramuerto

customer_reviews.title: Redemption Round
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Creepy, in depth, and challenging. Would definitely recommend to fans of Resident Evil or survival horror fans.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Scared the crap outta me even the 5th or 6th time playing
customer_reviews.author: Eli James

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Just gore for gore, had to download as well,not today!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. Great game. RE is making a comeback to its roots. Hopefully is will continue
customer_reviews.author: JC364

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Brought this game for my grandson he loves it ,got the gold edition great game for the Xbox one
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Play Alone!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and scary. Player movement is kinda clunky. Still super fun.
customer_reviews.author: joshua branham

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an amazing experience. Brings Resident Evil back to it's origins of horror. Not filled with the action of the past games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting for this game for a long time. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Luis JrTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great game, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great game, nice change from previous entries (I'm looking at you 6!). With MIST of the DLC on the disc.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: Disc case came cracked, but the game disc was not affected, game is awesome a definite buy for Resident Evil fans.
customer_reviews.author: Yhanic Morris

customer_reviews.title: Spooky.
customer_reviews.text: First play through was terrifying, it's a definitely a must have game.
customer_reviews.author: Kenji Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the addition of all the DLC modes. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hiegel

customer_reviews.title: A true retuen to formula
customer_reviews.text: An awesome return to what long time fans love about this series to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of resident evil since the original on playstation. I know they tried to take the franchise in a new direction, which I applaud, but i was disappointed entirely.
customer_reviews.author: sumbody

product_meta.title: Resident Evil 7 Biohazard Gold Edition - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:GoldThe Gold Edition will include all the contents from the critically acclaimed release along with all three pieces of downloadable add-on content, in one ultimate horror package. These previously released DLC packs - Banned Footage Vol. 1 and Banned Footage Vol. 2 will be included as well as the upcoming third DLC release End of Zoe.
feature_bullets: The delayed Not a Hero DLC content will be available to download for free for owners of any version of Resident Evil 7 biohazard
End of Zoe is a shocking instalment of the Resident Evil 7 biohazard saga where players discover what Zoe's fate will be. Players will face off against new enemies and explore new swamp filled areas
Taking place after the horrific events that befell Ethan Winters in Resident Evil 7 biohazard, Not a Hero brings a brand new experience playing as Chris to face new threats not met in the main game.
As a member of New Umbrella, Chris and team quickly set up a strategy to counter this latest threat. Will Chris once again solve the mystery of this latest outbreak?

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
